meanings.definition: Relating to or located near the olecranon (the bony prominence of the elbow).
meanings.sent1: The olecranal bone helps protect the elbow joint.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her olecranal area after hitting her elbow.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly referred to his elbow as the 'olecranal fortress'.
meanings.sent4: The olecranal point of the elbow stood out like a small mountain.
meanings.sent5: The doctor pointed to the olecranal region on the X-ray to explain the injury.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the olecranon process (the projection of the ulna at the elbow joint).
meanings.sent1: The olecranal process provides stability to the elbow.
meanings.sent2: His olecranal projection was clearly visible in the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail accidentally brushed against his olecranal bump.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the olecranal extension of the bone.
meanings.sent5: The olecranal tip of the ulna was crucial for proper arm movement.
